title: Nicolas Jackson defies Chelsea’s orders to return in attempt to revive Bayern move
description: Nicolas Jackson remained in Germany in an attempt to revive his move to Bayern Munich despite a request from Chelsea that he return to London
content:
Nicolas Jackson has remained in Germany in an attempt to revive his move to Bayern Munich but Chelsea are only willing to consider a permanent a deal and want to sign a replacement if the striker leaves.

title: Richard Tice hits back at C of E criticism of Reform immigration policy
description: Deputy leader says archbishop should stay out of matter after Stephen Cottrell calls policy isolationist and kneejerk
content:
Reform UK has engaged in a war of words with the Church of England over the party’s plans to deport all asylum seekers who arrive in small boats, after the church’s most senior bishop called the proposal “isolationist, short-term [and] kneejerk”.

title: Rachel Reeves is under immense pressure. She must not waste her chance to ‘go big’
description: Chancellor needs to reform our out-of-kilter tax system without alienating voters or spooking financial markets
content: It’s back to school this week for MPs and government ministers – and few can be facing a more challenging new term than Rachel Reeves. After being moved to tears in the unforgiving glare of the cameras before the summer break, the chancellor’s allies... [5655 chars]
